call(bytes16,bytes16,bytes).notice: Call the system at the given namespace and name. If the system is not public, the caller must have access to the namespace or name.

deleteRecord(bytes16,bytes16,bytes32[]).notice: Delete a record in the table at the given namespace and name. Requires the caller to have access to the namespace or name.

installRootModule(address,bytes).notice: Install the given root module in the World. Requires the caller to own the root namespace. The module is delegatecalled and installed in the root namespace.

popFromField(bytes16,bytes16,bytes32[],u.notice: Pop data from the end of a field in the table at the given namespace and name. Requires the caller to have access to the namespace or name.

pushToField(bytes16,bytes16,bytes32[],ui.notice: Push data to the end of a field in the table at the given namespace and name. Requires the caller to have access to the namespace or name.

setField(bytes16,bytes16,bytes32[],uint8.notice: Write a field in the table at the given namespace and name. Requires the caller to have access to the namespace or name.

setRecord(bytes16,bytes16,bytes32[],byte.notice: Write a record in the table at the given namespace and name. Requires the caller to have access to the namespace or name.

updateInField(bytes16,bytes16,bytes32[],.notice: Update data at `startByteIndex` of a field in the table at the given namespace and name. Requires the caller to have access to the namespace or name.
